## Feb 28, 2026 — Daily Opportunity Scan

### 1. 🔥 NMBR | Platform Expand — New Canadian Market Entry Service (HIGH VALUE)
- **WHAT:** Platform Expand (subsidiary of Sparkcorpnet) just launched 3 premium services helping international companies incorporate and expand into Canada — packages from $1,990. Announced Feb 25.
- **WHY IT MATTERS:** Every company they help set up in Canada will need Canadian payroll. Platform Expand is a potential channel partner or referral source for Nmbr — they're literally creating Nmbr's ideal customers.
- **SUGGESTED ACTION:** Reach out to Platform Expand about a payroll referral partnership. Their clients are international companies entering Canada who have zero payroll infrastructure — perfect Nmbr fit.

### 2. 📊 NMBR | Tech Hiring Boom in Canada — 48% of IT Managers Expanding Teams
- **WHAT:** Robert Half data shows 48% of Canadian IT hiring managers plan to expand teams in 2026, with demand spreading beyond Toronto/Vancouver/Montreal to secondary cities.
- **WHY IT MATTERS:** More hiring = more payroll processing = more demand for embedded payroll solutions. SaaS companies serving these growing tech employers need payroll capabilities.
- **SUGGESTED ACTION:** Use this stat in partner sales conversations — "your customers are scaling headcount, they need payroll now" is a compelling narrative for vertical SaaS partners.

### 3. 🏢 NMBR | Toronto Downtown Office Comeback — Wealthsimple, Lyft, Nvidia Expanding
- **WHAT:** Major tech companies (Wealthsimple, Lyft, Nvidia) are taking significant office space in downtown Toronto, fueling a commercial real estate comeback per Royal LePage.
- **WHY IT MATTERS:** These are large employers scaling Canadian operations. Their HR/workforce management SaaS vendors will need embedded payroll. Also signals that Canada-expansion trend is accelerating.
- **SUGGESTED ACTION:** Monitor which HR/workforce SaaS platforms these companies use — those platforms are potential Nmbr partners.

### 4. ⚖️ CHARLIE | Law Firms Investing Heavily in AI Automation
- **WHAT:** Multiple industry reports this week confirm law firms are accelerating AI adoption for client intake, billing efficiency, and lead management in 2026.
- **WHY IT MATTERS:** PI law firms are Charlie's sweet spot. The narrative is shifting from "should we use AI?" to "which AI do we use?" — Charlie needs to be in that conversation.
- **SUGGESTED ACTION:** Content play — position Charlie case studies around speed-to-contact stats for PI firms. The 6x stat is the killer differentiator.

### 5. 📈 MARKET | ADP Canada Publishing 2026 Workplace Trends
- **WHAT:** ADP Canada released their 2026 workplace trends report — focused on multi-generational teams, AI deployment, and new regulations.
- **WHY IT MATTERS:** Competitive intel. Know what ADP is telling the market so Nmbr can counter-position. ADP selling complexity = Nmbr selling simplicity through embedded solutions.
- **SUGGESTED ACTION:** Skim the ADP report for talking points to use (or counter) in partner conversations.
